name: Joe Ramsey
text: It‚Äôs nice to finally order a pizza from a place that actually gives you what you pay for. The staff is awesome and they make your food exactly how you want it with no issues. All good vibes from this Pizza Hut staff. Thanks gals and guys for going the extra mile.

name: Corey Kelly
text: Pizza tastes ok... but they usually screw something up every time I order. Ordered online for a birthday party and scheduled for 11:45. Pizza was very late. ‚Ä¶More

text: Great friendly fast service

name: Maria Torres

name: Cody Danford
text: Messed our order up several times. Pizza wasn't cut. Breadsticks made with no seasoning. Over charged us several times and had to go back and fix the price after delivery. Now they tell us the will only deliver to us if they aren't busy, ‚Ä¶More

text: Very disappointed with my pizza. It was burned up.  I will not be ordering again from this pizza hut.

name: karen norris
text: It was terrible! Service was horrible.  Pizza was sitting on the counter for over 15 minutes.

text: I don't remember having service and hospitality this genuine in any restaurant! The guy running this place went above and beyond for me and my family!! Best experience I've ever had in a restaurant! Food was very tasty and fresh! Great place to sit and eat!

text: Took over an hour and a half to pickup pizza in the lobby area. We, with over 16 other people waiting, were in there forever. They weren't getting orders out at all. It took over 30 minutes for them to just get one pizza out. ‚Ä¶More

name: J M Sample
text: Just got my pizza & wanted to give a shout out to Daniel for the great customer service. Keep up the good work!

text: We order pizza about once a week - it‚Äôs convenient and super easy to order on the app - and earn free pizza. The food is the best pizza in an 800 mile radius - my husband travels and has ordered from Pizza Hut all over and he says Needville has the best! We tried the pasta and it was awesome!

text: I wish I could give no stars. This place has been a roller coaster in quality since day 1 going from bad to good back to bad. The staff seems miserable, management is pretty much clueless to the problems. My food order took FOREVER to come ‚Ä¶More
